items.summary: Modify the Morning Routine container in MorningRoutine.tsx to have a compact height that displays a maximum of 4 rows of routine items. When more than 4 rows exist, the container should become vertically scrollable while maintaining the compact height limit.

Modify the Evening Routine container in MorningRoutine.tsx to have a compact height that displays a maximum of 4 rows of routine items. When more than 4 rows exist, the container should become vertically scrollable while maintaining the compact height limit.

Change the button label from 'Reset New day' to 'Start New Day' in the component where the new day reset functionality is implemented (likely in TaskManager.tsx or related routine management component).
